attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having made my petition that was quite obviously requesting the stopping of paying our taxes for the purpose of religious education I'm told that it is not acceptable as it isn't a request for, or a clear call for action. I wonder what would make a request. I take it we are using the same language? Isn't it really the case that my petition is actually deemed politically incorrect as it might upset those who have a faith...never mind about those with no faith…..It is patently obvious by any intelligent person that the belief in a God who is in tune with our thoughts is childish in the extreme- never mind that this same God is only able to construct a person from dust given he created the World from nothing!! That children’s minds are filled with such nonsense is quite disgraceful in this enlightened age.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
